ChildBranches.Name: Investigate the hold
ChildBranches.Description: What treasure did these villains take?

DefaultEvent.Description: $Clay M[ae]n -> クレイマン, Unfinished M[ae]n -> 未完成クレイマン$An Unfinished Man is missing something that other Clay Men lack. What did each of these your enemies lack? An eye. A hand. Mercy. Obedience. Fear. Pain. A shadow. A sense of proportion. This may serve as material for philosophy, or for battle tactics.
DefaultEvent.Name: A hundred absences

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered at least 10 Observations, you may learn something...

Description: $Unfinished M[ae]n -> 未完成クレイマン$Fragments of clay are littered across the deck. They crunch underfoot like potsherds. Unfinished Men do not surrender.
Name: You've destroyed the Unfinished Pirates
